city.heading: A city I would like to visit
city.name: Paris (City of Light)
city.description: Paris is a city I'd love to visit because whenever I see it on TV, it looks absolutely incredible. The buildings there are so beautiful, especially that tower thing, the Eiffel Tower, I think it's called. And they have these amazing old churches and museums with famous paintings and stuff. The food looks amazing too, like they have these fancy pastries and delicious meals.

foreignLanguage.heading: Foreign language I would like to learn
foreignLanguage.description: I'd like to learn Spanish because it sounds so beautiful and classy. Plus, I think it would be really cool to be able to speak with people from different countries and understand Spanish movies and songs. Learning Spanish could open up new opportunities for me to travel and connect with others around the world.

place1.name: Voortrekker Monument
description1: One of the longest historical artworks

place2.name: Union Buildings
description2: Holds official seat of SA government

place3.name: Freedom Park
description3: The park offers a panoramic view of Pretoria
